author: alg
msg: #54102# added support for rotation, shear and mirror for SdrEdgeObj (Edges, Connectors), added interactive preview, allowed these actions for editing

author: ivank
msg: BOOKKEEPER-203: improve ledger manager interface to remove zookeeper dependency on metadata operations. (sijie via ivank)

author: justin
msg: SLING-2363 - replacing javadoc with real annotations in content loader bundle

author: rwesten
msg: CLEREZZA-691: Implementation of the Single Jena TDB dataset provider.

* Configuration policy is now OPTIONAL  - this results in the creation of a default instance (with the servicePID equals to the class name of the component - "org.apache.clerezza.rdf.jena.tdb.storage.SingleTdbDatasetTcProvider"
* data directory is now a optional parameter: By default the {bundle-data-dir}/singleTdb/{servicePID} is used.
* Default priority is now higher as of the old TdbDatasetTcProvider (as suggested by Reto) - NOTE this might cause a change of the default TcProvider used by the TcManager
